abstract: Charles K. Gifford, the former chief executive of Fleet Financial, retired from Bank of America four years ago, several months after the $47 billion merger of the two banks was completed.
lead_paragraph: Charles K. Gifford, the former chief executive of Fleet Financial, retired from Bank of America four years ago, several months after the $47 billion merger of the two banks was completed.

headline.main: Former Fleet Chief Still Flying High
